title: Refining Grain and Optimizing Grain Boundary by Al2Yb to Enable the Dendrite-free Lithium Anode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00411F, Paper
Yunlong Deng, Jian Gao, Ming Wang, Jinxiang Deng, Yicheng Zhou, Wei Sun
Effective lithium (Li) metal alloying in adjusting its crystallization process offers a reliable approach to refine grain size and alter grain boundary composition, consequently enhancing its stripping/plating behavior. Key requisites...
